column1: In the ancient lands along the Mediterranean, players attempt to satisfy their unique victory conditions via trade, war and construction.  This lavishly produced game contains tons of wooden game components and a beautiful roll-out vinyl map.  Players produce a score of different commodities to trade with other cities in the hope of creating enough income to fill their capitals with buildings, produce artwork, and fill warehouses with goods.<br/><br/>
Ancient: Greece, Ancient: Rome, Components: Wooden pieces & boards, Containers: Tubes, Region: Mediterranean Sea
